mapper.select: select folder.username, folder.seq, folder.name, folder.locked, folder.shared, folder.guest, account.expiredt from folder left join account on folder.guest = account.username where folder.username = #{username} order by folder.seq asc

select folder.username, folder.seq, folder.name, folder.locked, folder.shared, folder.guest, account.expiredt from folder left join account on folder.guest = account.username where folder.username = #{username} and folder.seq = #{seq}
insert into folder (username, locked, shared, createdt) values (#{username}, false, false, #{createdt}) returning seq
